name: Throw It
description:
Throw It is a game where you and your teammate try to make as much money as possible by sorting the boxes into their respective places before time runs out.
Blue boxes must not be thrown outside as their value will be deducted from the amount of money collected.
At the end of each match, the value you and your teammates collect is added to your personal money what you can use to buy from point shop.

Leaderboards

Develop with your teammate the best and fastest tactics to sort the boxes and earn your place at the top of the scoreboard.
Game has a global leaderboard for three maps Warehouse, Island and Tower.

Customize

You can change the character colors with the default colors and colors that can be found in the point store.
Sort the boxes and earn money. Use your personal money to buy new colors from point shop.
